00031 using namespace std;

00033 
00034 void Session::queueCreate(CUrl url, cstr description)
00035     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00036 {
00037     checkStarted();
00038     CUrl aurl = getAbsoluteUrl(url);
00039     repository->addGenericProperty(QUEUE_CLASSNAME, aurl, description);
00040     ownedPropertiesMutex.lock(HERE);
00041     ownedProperties.insert(aurl);
00042     ownedPropertiesMutex.unlock();
00043     Property* p = lockAndGetProperty(url);
00044     p->setObject(new RObjectPipeQueue(aurl));
00045     //p->setPersistent(false);  // FIXME can be not persistent only
00046         // when the links are always persistent
00047     unlockProperty(p);
00048 }
00049 
00050 bool Session::queuePush(CUrl url, RDK2::Object* object) throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00051 {
00052     Property* p = lockAndGetProperty(url);
00053 
00054     bool res = false;
00055     if (p->getObjectClassName() == "") p->setObjectClassName(QUEUE_CLASSNAME);  // XXX are we sure?
00056     if (!p->isQueue()) throw InvalidOperation("Property '" + url + "' is not a queue");
00057     RObjectPipeQueue* queue = dynamic_cast<RObjectPipeQueue*>(getProperty(url)->object);
00058     if (queue) {
00059         res = queue->push(object, HERE);
00060         queue->gc(HERE);
00061     }
00062     if (url.isComplete() && url.getHost() != getRepositoryName()) {
00063         RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Sending object to the remote queue '%s'", p->url.c_str());
00064         repository->sendObjectsToRemoteQueueSubscribers(getAbsoluteUrl(url), object);
00065     }
00066     // NOTE: sessions listening to this queue are awaken by the queue itself
00067 
00068     unlockProperty(p);
00069     return res;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void Session::queueSubscribe(CUrl url, QueueSubscriptionMode qsm)
00073     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00074 {
00075     // this will subscribe the queue if it is not
00076     map<Url, QueueSubscription>::iterator it = queueGetSubscription(url, true, qsm);
00077     // this is needed if the subscription needs to be changed
00078     it->second.mode = qsm;
00079 }
00080 
00081 void Session::queueUnsubscribe(CUrl url)
00082     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00083 {
00084     map<Url, QueueSubscription>::iterator it = queueGetSubscription(url, false);
00085     if (it != queueSubscriptions.end()) {
00086         Property* p = lockAndGetProperty(url);
00087         RObjectPipeQueue* queue = p->getObjectAsL<RObjectPipeQueue>();
00088         queue->deleteConsumer(it->second.consumerQueue, HERE);
00089         unlockProperty(p);
00090         queueSubscriptions.erase(it);
00091     }
00092 }
00093 
00094 void Session::queueSetInterests(CUrl url, PosixQueues::MyInterests<RDK2::Object>* i)
00095     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00096 {
00097     map<Url, QueueSubscription>::iterator it = queueGetSubscription(url, true, QUEUE_ALL);
00098     Property* p = lockAndGetProperty(url);
00099     RObjectPipeQueue* queue = p->getObjectAsL<RObjectPipeQueue>();
00100     queue->setInterests(it->second.consumerQueue, i);
00101     unlockProperty(p);
00102 }

00104 vector<const RDK2::Object*> Session::queueFreeze(CUrl url)
00105     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00106 {
00107     map<Url, QueueSubscription>::iterator it = queueGetSubscription(url, true, QUEUE_ALL);
00108     RConsumerObjectPipeQueue* cq = it->second.consumerQueue;
00109     vector<const RDK2::Object*> r = cq->freeze();
00110 /*  RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Freezing something in '%s' (%s, %d, %p)", url.c_str(), sessionName.c_str(),
00111         r.size(), cq);*/
00112     // FIXME non tiene conto degli eventuali keep
00113     if (r.size() && it->second.isListened) {
00114         for (size_t i = 0; i < r.size() - 1; i++) {
00115             sessionSemaphore.wait();
00116         }
00117     }
00118     ostringstream oss;
00119     oss << r.size();
00120     Profiler::addCustomLine("QUEUE_FREEZE", (sessionName + ":" + url).c_str(), oss.str().c_str());
00121     return r;
00122 }

00124 vector<const RDK2::Object*> Session::queueContent(CUrl url)
00125     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00126 {
00127     map<Url, QueueSubscription>::iterator it = queueGetSubscription(url, true, QUEUE_ALL);
00128     return it->second.consumerQueue->content();
00129 }
00130 
00131 void Session::queueKeep(CUrl url, const RDK2::Object* object)
00132     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00133 {
00134     map<Url, QueueSubscription>::iterator it = queueGetSubscription(url, true, QUEUE_ALL);
00135     RConsumerObjectPipeQueue* cop = it->second.consumerQueue;
00136     vector<const RDK2::Object*> content = cop->content();
00137 
00138     if (content.end() == find(content.begin(), content.end(), object)) {
00139         throw InvalidOperation("Keep()ing a pointer not present in queue");
00140     }
00141     else {
00142         cop->keep(object);
00143     }
00144 }
00145 
00146 const RDK2::Object* Session::queueLast(CUrl url)
00147     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00148 {
00149     map<Url, QueueSubscription>::iterator it = queueGetSubscription(url, true, QUEUE_LAST_OBJECT);
00150     return it->second.consumerQueue->last();
00151 }

00153 size_t Session::queueSize(CUrl url)
00154     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00155 {
00156     Property* p = lockAndGetProperty(url);
00157 
00158     size_t queueSize = 0;
00159     if (p->getObjectClassName() == "") p->setObjectClassName(QUEUE_CLASSNAME);  // XXX are we sure?
00160     if (!p->isQueue()) throw InvalidOperation("Property '" + url + "' is not a queue");
00161     RObjectPipeQueue* queue = dynamic_cast<RObjectPipeQueue*>(getProperty(url)->object);
00162     if (queue) {
00163         queueSize = queue->size();
00164     }
00165 
00166     unlockProperty(p);
00167     return queueSize;
00168 }
00169 
00172 // protected
00173 map<Url, Session::QueueSubscription>::iterator
00174 Session::queueGetSubscription(CUrl url, bool alsoCreate, QueueSubscriptionMode qsm)
00175     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00176 {
00177     checkStarted();
00178     Url aurl = getAbsoluteUrl(url);
00179     map<Url, QueueSubscription>::iterator it = queueSubscriptions.find(aurl);
00180     if (it == queueSubscriptions.end() && alsoCreate) {
00181         // the queue is not subscribed yet by this session
00182         Property* p = lockAndGetProperty(aurl);
00183         RObjectPipeQueue* queue = p->getObjectAsL<RObjectPipeQueue>();
00184         RConsumerObjectPipeQueue* consumerQueue =
00185             queue->createConsumer(aurl + "[" + sessionName + "]", HERE);
00186         queue->setSignalSemaphore(consumerQueue, 0);
00187         unlockProperty(p);
00188         QueueSubscription qs;
00189         qs.consumerQueue = consumerQueue;
00190         qs.mode = qsm;
00191         qs.isListened = false;
00192         pair<map<Url, QueueSubscription>::iterator, bool> insret =
00193             queueSubscriptions.insert(make_pair(aurl, qs));
00194 /*      RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Created subscription of queue '%s' for "
00195             "session '%s' %p", aurl.c_str(), sessionName.c_str(), this);*/
00196         return insret.first;
00197     }
00198     return it;
00199 }
00200 
00201 // protected
00202 void Session::listenToQueue(CUrl url)
00203     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00204 {
00205     // listen implies subscribe
00206     // if the queue isn't subscribed, this will subscribe it (with QUEUE_ALL option)
00207     // it this is already subscribed, the subscription will not changed
00208     map<Url, QueueSubscription>::iterator it = queueGetSubscription(url, true, QUEUE_ALL);
00209     Property* p = lockAndGetProperty(url);
00210     RObjectPipeQueue* queue = p->getObjectAsL<RObjectPipeQueue>();
00211     queue->setSignalSemaphore(it->second.consumerQueue, &sessionSemaphore);
00212     it->second.isListened = true;
00213     unlockProperty(p);
00214 }
00215 
00216 // protected
00217 void Session::unlistenToQueue(CUrl url)
00218     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00219 {
00220     map<Url, QueueSubscription>::iterator it = queueGetSubscription(url, false);
00221     if (it != queueSubscriptions.end()) {
00222         Property* p = lockAndGetProperty(url);
00223         RObjectPipeQueue* queue = p->getObjectAsL<RObjectPipeQueue>();
00224         queue->setSignalSemaphore(it->second.consumerQueue, 0);
00225         it->second.isListened = false;
00226         unlockProperty(p);
00227     }
00228 }
